newsitem.title: UK: LB Rheinland-Pfalz to launch $500 mln five-yr bond.
newsitem.headline: LB Rheinland-Pfalz to launch $500 mln five-yr bond.

text.p: Landesbank Rheinland-Pfalz is expected to launch a $500 million five-year Euro-Asian bond on Wednesday, joint lead managers IBJ and Merrill Lynch said on Tuesday.
The deal would be priced to yield 15 basis points over U.S. Treasury notes, the lead managers said.
LB Rheinland-Pfalz is rated Aa1 by Moody's Investors Service and AA plus by Standard & Poor's.
